name: THE GREY MAN
description:
A mysterious landing...
What could this mean for the visitors of Tinderboone National Park..?A curious glowing entity...
Assume the role of an extra dimensional being that gets weird in the woods, night after night.An expansive national park...
Wander across an interactive open world environment..and encounter the humans that hang around in it.

Features:
  • Be an alien
  • Chill out in the woods
  • UFO fast travel
  • Say "Hello" to humans
  • At least 10 layers of parallax, wow
  • Creep around an ever changing environment
  • Unlock new cosmic abilities
  • Insect friends
  • Move around using a keyboard
  • Occasional forest fire surprises
  • Very funky music soundtrack
  • Experiment with touching things



The Grey Man is waiting for you.
______________________________________________________________________________

THE GREY MAN is part of THE ATTACK PACK, which also includes SOS and QUACK ATTACK 1985: TURBO DX EDITION!
WHOA WHOA WHOA - Is that three games you say? Thank you oh glorious infinite video game deity for this bounty of digital treats! CHECK IT OUT HERE: http://store.steampowered.com/bundle/2003/

Find a bug ? Email us at bugkill@attackmountain.com
